title: "How the Pentagon’s AI Center Aims to Advance ‘Responsible AI Literacy’ in 2021"
excerpt: "In 2021, the Pentagon’s Joint Artificial Intelligence Center intends to further push forward foundational guidance and projects promoting responsible AI use and strengthened awareness across the entire Defense enterprise—and the National Defense Authorization Act contained a few mandates that could support those fresh efforts."
